file_content.text: ...So then I finally decided I was fed up with all the bullying and intimidation. I told her, "No, go do it yourself, you insufferable organic!"
...So then I finally decided I was fed up with all the bullying and intimidation. I told him, "No, go do it yourself, you insufferable organic!"
Hi there, 2V-R8!
[Keep watching]
Oh! Master! Oh my! You're... still alive. How... unfortunate--that I was not able to find you sooner! How long have you been standing there?
Insufferable organic = behind you?
Who are we talking about?
Long enough....
I hope you weren't talking about me....
[Stare coldly]
Hypothetically speaking, which limb would you say you need the least?
Of course not, master! I was speaking of... somebody else I've been serving these past five years you've been gone. Yes, someone else entirely.
Have I mentioned how incredibly terrifying and lethal you look today?
Oh, I've just remembered our ship needs a thorough dusting... I'll be going to take care of that then....
All of my limbs exist only to serve you, master! Therefore I would say they are all vital!
How unsettlingly vague... but then again, that is always what I've loved most about you, master! That and how you've never wanted to deactivate me....
Ah, greetings Alliance Commander! I am 2V-R8. I understand that you are to be my new master.
I already have a C2-N2 protocol droid.
Ah. C2-series droids are fine indeed... however, I understand that they can be a touch annoying in their obsession with personal comfort.
What happened to your old master?
Lost amongst the stars, I'm afraid. Or, more accurately, not afraid!
I couldn't be happier to have a new master. You see, my previous owner was terrifying and cruel... always threatening me.
I dare to dream that things might finally be looking up for me. I look forward to serving you, my warm and caring new master.
Whereas the 2V-series droid is more a model of efficiency and proper fearful obedience.
I expect this facility to be kept spotless if you want to avoid the scrap heap.
Well, you won't need to worry about that with me.
That's the first I've heard of this, but greetings nonetheless.
Oh my... a polite greeting. No thinly veiled threats of deactivation or scrapping... is my nightmare over?
Oh... I... Yes master, I understand... I shall see to it at once....
So long as you're not annoying, I think we'll get along just fine.
If you've tolerated a C2 droid for years, master, I am confident we shall have no such problems.
Greetings, my kind and benevolent master. How may I serve you today?
Greetings, master. Have I mentioned how terrifying and formidable you look today?
She's lucky she ran away when she did! She was just about one insult away from an "accident" with the airlock!
He's lucky he ran when he did! He was about one insult away from an "accident" with the airlock!
